text:
CRISTIANO RONALDO'S girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez has given birth to a baby girl.

The Real Madrid star confirmed Alana Martina was safe and well after joining his ever-growing clan on Sunday.

7 Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez now have a baby girl together Credit: Twitter

7 Ronaldo looked delighted in a snap uploaded to social media Credit: Getty Images

Ronaldo already has three children and recently revealed he was delighted to be welcoming a fourth to the family.

Twenty-two-year-old Rodriguez looked to be in good spirits despite her ordeal while Ronaldo Jr flashed a smile at the camera as his father beamed next him.

Rodriguez was admitted to hospital this evening in Madrid, around nine days earlier than predicted by the Spanish media.

Reflecting on life as a father at the launch of his new clothing line last week, Ronaldo said: "Being a father is a unique and personal journey, something that has changed me completely.

Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez announce their fourth child will be named Alana Martina

SUN BETS: BET £10 GET A FREE £30 BET

7 Alana Martina is the latest addition to Ronaldo's ever-growing brood Credit: Getty

7 The couple have been together for around a year Credit: Getty

“It’s taught me things about love that I never knew existed.

“It has softened me and given me a different perspective on what is really important in my life.

“I can’t wait to be a dad again. Being a father and seeing my family grow is without doubt the greatest privilege I’ve had.

“Spending time with them, being by their side, smiling and laughing with them. They’ve brought a lot of happiness and joy to my life.”

7 Ronaldo also has twins as well as son Cristiano Jr Credit: Instagram

7 Rodriguez was taken to hospital in Madrid on Sunday night Credit: Splash News

7 Ronaldo now has four children as Rodriguez prepares for life as a mother Credit: Rex Features

Cristiano Ronaldo Jr stars with his dad in advert for CR7 junior collection
title: Cristiano Ronaldo’s girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez gives birth to baby girl Alana Martina – The Sun
